Growing up, I wasn't the richest but I had a rich family in spirit and support.
Standing here with 19 championships is something I never thought would happen.
I went on the courts with just a ball and a racket and a hope and that's all I had.
It's inspiring for all you guys out there that wanna do something...
...and wanna be the best that you can be...
...and wanna do the best that you can do.
You just never give up 'cause you never know what can happen.
You never know who you can inspire and who you can influence.
